snippet.title: The Sims 4 Businesses & Hobbies Expansion Pack | Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sims™ 4 Businesses & Hobbies Expansion Pack* arrives Mar 6 and is available for pre-order now: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/buy/addon/the-sims-4-businesses-and-hobbies-expansion-pack
 
Order now through Apr 18 for the Set Up Shop Digital Content**; the Practice Makes Perfect Priscilla Statue, Sweetest Treat Display Case, and the Beautiful Flaws Lamp. 
 
Find inspiration for your new business: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/news/businesses-and-hobbies-expansion-pack
 
Savvy Sims can turn their wildest dreams into profitable businesses, so make sure to create something special. Get ready to run your business out of your home, hire employees, decide how to charge, and make the rules! 
 
You'll have two new hobbies to pursue: Tattooing and Pottery. Set up a new Tattoo or Pottery Studio or simply pursue your craft. You can even design your own custom tattoos with the new Tattoo Paint Tool. 
 
Available March 6 at 10AM PT on EA App PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®5. Pre-order now: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/buy/addon/the-sims-4-businesses-and-hobbies-expansion-pack
 
*Requires The Sims™ 4 & all game updates. For PC, see minimum system requirements for the pack. 
 
**CONDITIONS AND RESTRICTIONS APPLY. https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/buy/addon/the-sims-4-businesses-and-hobbies-expansion-pack
